chantey.title: Reuben Ranzo
chantey.text:
Oh, poor Reuben Ranzo, _Ranzo,_ boys, _Ranzo!_ Oh, poor Reuben Ranzo, _Ranzo,_ boys, _Ranzo!_
Oh, Reuben was no sailor, _Ranzo,_ boys, _Ranzo!_ Oh, Reuben was no sailor, _Ranzo,_ boys, _Ranzo!_
He shipped on board of a whaler, _Ranzo,_ boys, _Ranzo!_ He shipped on board of a whaler, _Ranzo,_ boys, _Ranzo!_
The captain was a bad man, _Ranzo,_ boys, _Ranzo!_ The captain was a bad man, _Ranzo,_ boys, _Ranzo!_
He put him in the rigging, _Ranzo,_ boys, _Ranzo!_ He put him in the rigging, _Ranzo,_ boys, _Ranzo!_
He gave him six and thirty, _Ranzo,_ boys, _Ranzo!_ He gave him six and thirty, _Ranzo,_ boys, _Ranzo!_
Oh I poor Reuben Ranzo, _Ranzo,_ boys, _Ranzo!_ Oh Ipoor Reuben Ranzo, _Ranzo,_ boys, _Ranzo!_
